item.title: Home Depot CFO says retailer doesn't plan to raise prices due to tariffs

item.title: Klarna doubles losses in first quarter as IPO remains on hold
item.description: Klarna said its net loss for the first three months of 2025 totalled $99 million, up 110% from a year ago.

item.title: Cava revenue beats estimates as Mediterranean chain reports double-digit same-store sales growth
item.description: Other restaurant companies have reported same-store sales declines and falling traffic as consumers have pulled back their restaurant spending.
